text: That Can Happen to Anyone () is a 1952 West German comedy film directed by Paul Verhoeven and starring Heinz Rühmann, , and Gustav Knuth. It was made at the Bavaria Studios in Munich. ==Cast== == References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1952 films Category:1952 comedy films Category:German comedy films Category:West German films Category:German- language films Category:Films directed by Paul Verhoeven (Germany)
